model_outputs.question:

That error will be one of the following types: Named Entities: An entity (names, places, locations, etc.) is changed to a different entity. Numerical Values: Numerical values (ordinals or cardinals), dates, and/or units are changed. Modifiers or Adjectives: The modifiers and adjectives pertaining to a noun are changed. Dropped Content: A significant clause in the translation is removed. Please identify that error.  Source: Die Asian German Sports Exchange Programme ist eine nicht kommerzielle Nichtregierungsorganisation, die sich zur Aufgabe gemacht hat, den Friedensprozess, vor allem in Sri Lanka, nachhaltig durch das Motto „connecting sportspeople“ mitzugestalten.
Translation: The Asian German Sports Exchange Programme is an organisation that has set itself the task of sustainably shaping the peace process, especially in Sri Lanka, through the motto "connecting sportspeople".
The translation contains an error pertaining to
Options:
(A) Modifiers or Adjectives
(B) Numerical Values
(C) Negation or Antonyms
(D) Named Entities
(E) Dropped Content
(F) Facts
model_outputs.model_answer: The translation seems to be accurate and does not contain any obvious errors pertaining to numerical values, negation or antonyms, dropped content, or facts. However, the original German text mentions "eine nicht kommerzielle Nichtregierungsorganisation" which translates to "a non-commercial non-governmental organization", but this is not included in the English translation. Therefore, the error pertains to dropped content. The answer is (E).
